column4: is there a website with a basic tutorial of ubuntu install so i dont have to install the ubuntu-desktop package
do you want to pick particular programs, or no desktop at all?
well i want a xserver setup
ok, do a server install, then apt-get install x-window-system, and your favorite window manager.

that will get xorg :)
